definition: to advise/to urge/to try to persuade/to exhort/to console/to soothe
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Unless the cloud crazy fun can be persuaded, but cloud is dead.
sentences.chinese: 除非雲狂能勸動樂兒，但是雲狂已經死了。

sentences.english: Through patience a ruler can be persuaded, and a gentle tongue can break a bone.
sentences.chinese: 恆常忍耐可以勸動君王，柔和的舌頭能折斷骨頭。
